name: Polymer.CoreFocusable
description:
`Polymer.CoreFocusable` is a mixin for elements that the user can interact with.
Elements using this mixin will receive attributes reflecting the focus, pressed
and disabled states.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description:
If true, the element is currently active either because the
user is touching it, or the button is a toggle
and is currently in the active state.

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description:
If true, the element currently has focus due to keyboard
navigation.

attributes.name: pressed
attributes.description: If true, the user is currently holding down the button.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.

attributes.name: toggle
attributes.description:
If true, the button toggles the active state with each tap.
Otherwise, the button becomes active when the user is holding
it down.
